title: Advanced Robotics Projects
description: A collection of mobile robots focusing on kinematics, suspension systems, and omnidirectional movement.

details.intro: My robotics work focuses on mechanical design (SolidWorks), inverse kinematics (Python/C++), and control systems. Below are my three flagship prototypes.

projects.title: Hexapod Robot
projects.description: A 6-legged walking robot designed for stability and terrain traversal. Features inverse kinematics for smooth movement.

projects.title: Mars Rover Prototype
projects.description: A prototype rover featuring rocker-bogie suspension system for obstacle climbing, similar to NASA designs.

projects.title: Omnidirectional Frisbee Launcher
projects.description: A mobile robot featuring mecanum wheels for agile movement. Designed with a custom spiral gravity-fed magazine and a dual-flywheel launching mechanism.

projects.title: Autonomous Obstacle Avoidance Robot
projects.description: An autonomous rover designed to navigate dynamic environments without human intervention. It utilizes ultrasonic range finders to detect objects in real-time, executing a custom collision-avoidance algorithm to halt, reverse, and recalculate its path upon detecting proximity.

video_files.caption: Testing autonomous navigation and sensor logic.

title: Embedded Systems & Electronics
description: Microcontroller projects involving IoT, sensor tracking, and logic displays.

details.intro: Bridging the gap between software logic and physical hardware using Arduino and ESP32.

projects.title: Embedded Systems & LEDs
projects.description: Programming microcontrollers for visual displays and logic operations. Focusing on timing and hardware integration.

projects.title: Dual-Axis Solar Tracker
projects.description: Implemented two versions: LDR-based (Light Dependent Resistor) and Wi-Fi enabled for remote monitoring and efficiency tracking.

title: Web Platforms & Education
description: Full-stack web applications designed to solve educational management problems.

details.intro: Software solutions built to streamline workflows in educational environments.

projects.title: Teacher Attendance Platform
projects.description: A web platform to streamline attendance tracking, reducing paperwork. Teachers log in, view specific classes, and mark attendance in real-time.

projects.title: English Learning Platform
projects.description: Interactive learning management system designed to help students improve English skills through gamified lessons.

title: Android Utility Apps
description: Various Android applications developed using Java/Kotlin, focusing on user utility and material design.

details.intro: I focus on building utility apps that solve specific real-world problems. Here is a breakdown of my work.

content.body:
Meet The Herbalist: Your AI-Powered Natural Health Companion.

Step away from the synthetic and return to the roots of healing. The Herbalist bridges the gap between ancestral knowledge and modern convenience, acting as your personal guide to the world of natural medicine.

What You Can Do:
ðŸŒ¿ Consult the Wise Healer: Simply describe your ailment, and our AIâ€”trained in the voice of a traditional herbal doctorâ€”will prescribe specific herbal recipes, preparation steps, and dosage instructions.
ðŸ’Š Find Natural Alternatives: Enter a drug name to discover well-known, ethnobotanical replacements.
ðŸ“– Build Your Grimoire: Save your favorite consultations to your personal Grimoire, available offline.
âœ¨ Spirit Check-In: Wellness isn't just physical. Use the daily tracker to monitor your energy levels.

Cook Smarter, Plan Better, Shop Together.
The modern cookbook app designed to streamline your entire cooking journey, from inspiration to the dinner table.

âœ¨ Smart Recipe Import: Stop scrolling through endless blog posts. IrieCooks instantly fetches the best recipes from the web.
ðŸ“… Weekly Meal Planner: Take the stress out of 'What's for dinner?' Assign recipes to any day with a simple tap.
ðŸ›’ Cloud-Synced Grocery Lists: Share your unique 'Family Code' with your partner and watch items get checked off in real-time as you shop.
ðŸ“¸ Capture Your Creations: Snap a photo and save your own custom family dishes directly to your personal cookbook.
ðŸ“± Built for Modern Android: Premium interface with smooth animations and a stunning dark theme.

Your Pocket Drill Sergeant.
ReggaeReps is a comprehensive tactical fitness ecosystem built for Android. We combine linear periodization logic with advanced tracking to ensure you never plateau.

Key Features:
â€¢ Daily Briefings & Missions: Calculated workout plans based on a progressive 30-day cycle.
â€¢ Tactical Library: A massive database ranging from Battle Ropes and Calisthenics to Yoga.
â€¢ Active Operation Mode: Built-in tactical stopwatch (with countdown beeps), set tracking, and haptic feedback.
â€¢ Biometric Scanning: Input body measurements and view your data mapped onto a gender-specific anatomical wireframe.
â€¢ Rank Progression: Earn your stripes. Start as a Recruit and grind your way to General based on mission consistency.

Animation Freedom in Your Pocket.
Create stunning frame-by-frame animations with a workspace that adapts to you.

IrieFlipArt isn't just a drawing app; itâ€™s a fluid animation studio. With our unique floating, collapsible toolbars, your canvas takes center stage. Sketch, smudge, blur, and animate without the clutter. Whether youâ€™re sketching a quick idea or rendering a masterpiece, find your flow with IrieFlipArt.

Precision Meets Chaos.
Dive into a high-octane, retro-futuristic battlefield where precision meets chaos. Pilot your craft through a vibrant, ever-shifting digital void, tearing through waves of AI-driven enemies in a symphony of light and lasers. Itâ€™s not just a survival shooterâ€”itâ€™s a test of reflexes in a world of pure neon.

title: 3D CAD & Design Hub
description: Complex mechanical assemblies, and parts designed in SolidWorks and Fusion 360 for 3D printing and CNC.

details.intro: I specialize in SolidWorks and OnShape. Below are my featured designs and educational content.
details.coming_soon_text: More mechanical assemblies and 3D printing time-lapses are currently being processed in the workshop. Check back soon for updates!

media_items.desc: Multi-Tool Print: Functional Ocarina produced on the Prusa XL.
Multi-Tool Print: Functional Water Vortex Creater produced on the Prusa XL.
Intro to CAD Class Day 1 (View on Onshape)

title: STEM Education & Teaching
description: Organized and taught curriculums covering LEGO building, Python programming, 3D printing, and introductory robotics.

details.intro: I have extensive experience teaching STEM concepts to various age groups, ranging from intensive summer camps to ongoing weekly curriculum.

projects.title: Teacher Introduction
projects.description: A look into my teaching style and classroom atmosphere.

projects.title: Minecraft Education: Logic & Design
projects.description: Using Minecraft as a CAD and Logic simulator. We cover logic gates, Redstone circuitry, and structural architecture.

projects.title: LEGO Engineering Curriculum
projects.description: Weekly sessions where students explore mechanical advantage, gear ratios, and structural integrity through LEGO Technic and customized builds.

projects.title: Career Exploration & Future STEM
projects.description: A series of sessions focused on connecting classroom builds to real-world engineering careers and industrial applications.

projects.title: Robotics Summer Camps
projects.description: High-intensity camps where students build, code, and compete. These photos capture the journey from raw components to functional robots.
